title: Schezwan Noodles 🍝
content:
Ingredients: Spaghetti noodles - 150 gms Chopped Onion - 1/2 cup Cubbed cabbage - 1/2 cup Finely chopped carrot - 1/2 cup Finely chopped jugni - 1/2 cup Schezwan sauce - 3 tb sp Coriander - 1/2 cup Pepper powder - 1 tea spoon Salt - as per taste Oil - 2 tb sp Procedure:
  • Heat medium sized bowl with 4 cups of water & salt in it. Boil water and add spaghetti noodles into it. Cook 3/4 of noodles
  • Drain water and keep aside
  • Heat oil in frying pan
  • Add chopped onion, carrot, jugni saute for 2 mins
  • Add cabbage and saute for 2 mins
  • Add noodles, schezwan sauce , pepper and salt. Mix them well
  • Saute 3 to 5 minutes
  • Garnish with coriander leaves
  • Schezwan Noodles ready to serve 🍝😃
  • Have it as breakfast/ evenings ... it's really yummy 😋
  • When you are serving to kids. Reduce schezwan sauce and pepper powder 
[caption id="attachment_media-7" align="alignnone" width="2048"] Schezwan Noodles 🍝[/caption] Follow us: Facebook Instagram Twitter Google+ Share your comments in below section, I like to know your feedback © 2017- 2018 Ramyarecipes
